rows.Definition: F = Foundational; P = Practitioner; A = Advanced; Au = Authority/Board-level.
P–A = stronger than Practitioner but not full Advanced; A–Au = between Advanced and Authority.
Per competency: min(level_i, level_j) / max(level_i, level_j). Overall overlap is the mean across competencies with values for both roles.
Most executive roles require proficiency across nearly all competencies at least at F; core exec competencies default to P.
Adjust cell values where your org’s context demands higher/lower proficiency; use ranges when appropriate.
